name: Introduction to Archaeology
description: This course provides an introduction to the field of Archaeology, including its history, methods, and theories.

name: Introduction to Paleoethnobotany
description: This course provides an introduction to the field of Paleoethnobotany, including its history, methods, and theories.

name: Archaeological Field Methods
description: This course covers the basics of archaeological field methods, including survey techniques, excavation, and data collection.

name: Archaeobotany: Identification and Analysis
description: This course covers the basics of archaeobotany, including plant identification and analysis.

name: Quantitative Analysis in Archaeology
description: This course covers the basics of quantitative analysis in Archaeology, including data collection and analysis.

name: Ethnobotany
description: This course covers the basics of ethnobotany, including the study of plants used by humans.

name: Advanced Paleoethnobotany
description: This course covers advanced topics in Paleoethnobotany, including data analysis and interpretation.
